data.text: @ChristineGuent8 Everyone thought bots/trolls were vanishing because Russia was distracted, but no. It's not like the US and oil & gas wings of bot campaigns aren't still going strong.
@Lidsville I noticed a fresh hatch of trolls/Russian bots a few days ago. Not just covid - Ukraine, convoysâ€¦
@Cabadobedia I'd be surprised if the PPC are not actively involved but I agree the real origin is far larger and more professionally masterminded than anything the PPC could gin up
@Lidsville https://t.co/YuzoozO6iB is especially satisfying, you can block everybody who likes a post that is particularly objectionable
@Darren_Young_A Report as fake ("Report as suspicious or spam," then "Report as fake account"). Then block.
@Lidsville hit that block button like bullets spraying from a machine gun!
